status.name: ER_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL
status.comment: Not enough space in buffer for operation.

status.name: ER_OS_ERROR
status.comment: Underlying OS has indicated an error.

status.name: ER_WOULDBLOCK
status.comment: An I/O attempt on non-blocking resource would block

status.name: ER_CONN_REFUSED
status.comment: Connection was refused because no one is listening

status.name: ER_BAD_ARG_COUNT
status.comment: Incorrect number of arguments given to function call

status.name: ER_COMMON_ERRORS
status.comment: Error code block for the Common subsystem.

status.name: ER_STOPPING_THREAD
status.comment: Operation interrupted by ERThread stop signal.

status.name: ER_ALERTED_THREAD
status.comment: Operation interrupted by ERThread alert signal.

status.name: ER_NO_SUCH_ALARM
status.comment: Attempt to reference non-existent timer alarm

status.name: ER_TIMER_FALLBEHIND
status.comment: A timer thread is missing scheduled alarm times

status.name: ER_SSL_ERRORS
status.comment: Error code block for SSL subsystem

status.name: ER_SSL_CONNECT
status.comment: Failed to connect to remote host using SSL

status.name: ER_SSL_VERIFY
status.comment: Failed to verify identity of SSL destination

status.name: ER_EXTERNAL_THREAD
status.comment: Operation not supported on external thread wrapper

status.name: ER_CRYPTO_ERROR
status.comment: Non-specific error in the crypto subsystem

status.name: ER_DEAD_THREAD
status.comment: Operation not allowed thread is dead

status.name: ER_THREAD_RUNNING
status.comment: Cannot start a thread that is already running

status.name: ER_THREAD_STOPPING
status.comment: Cannot start a thread that is already stopping

status.name: ER_BAD_STRING_ENCODING
status.comment: Encoded string did not have the expected format or contents

status.name: ER_CRYPTO_INSUFFICIENT_SECURITY
status.comment: Crypto algorithm parameters do not provide sufficient security

status.name: ER_CRYPTO_ILLEGAL_PARAMETERS
status.comment: Crypto algorithm parameter value is illegal

status.name: ER_CRYPTO_HASH_UNINITIALIZED
status.comment: Cryptographic hash function must be initialized

status.name: ER_THREAD_NO_WAIT
status.comment: Thread cannot be blocked by a WAIT or SLEEP call

status.name: ER_TIMER_EXITING
status.comment: Cannot add an alarm to a timer that is exiting

status.name: ER_INVALID_GUID
status.comment: String is not a hex encoded GUID string

status.name: ER_THREADPOOL_EXHAUSTED
status.comment: A thread pool has reached its specified concurrency

status.name: ER_THREADPOOL_STOPPING
status.comment: Cannot execute a closure on a stopping thread pool
